description:
As word of the Straw Hat resurrection spreads through the Navy, Luffy and his crew get acclimated to their underwater environment, and Franky reveals the startling identity of the man who protected their ship!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Suprising Fact! The Man Who Guarded the Sunny!
Kyougaku no Shinjitsu: Sunny-gou o Mamotta Otoko
L`incroyable vérité. L`histoire de l`homme qui protégea le Sunny
Шокирующее открытие! Человек, который защищал Санни!
حقيقة مفاجئة! الرّجل الّذي حمى السّفينة سّاني
驚愕の真実 サニー号を守った男
